instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Select the Display tab. Touch and slide the Brightness slider left or right to adjust the setting.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Select the Display tab. Tap Screen timeout. Select a screen timeout option: 15 seconds 30 seconds 1 minute 2 minutes 5 minutes 10 minutes 15 minutes Keep screen turned on

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap Home screen settings . Select a wallpaper from the following: Gallery Live Wallpapers Photos Wallpaper gallery Select the desired image. Tap Set wallpaper . A 'Wallpaper changed' message briefly flashes to confirm the change.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap Lock screen settings . Select a wallpaper from the following: Gallery Wallpaper gallery Select the desired image. Tap Set wallpaper . A 'Wallpaper changed' message briefly flashes to confirm the change.
